original_text: And they heard the voice of the Lord God walking in the garden in the cool of the day: and Adam and his wife hid themselves from the presence of the Lord God amongst the trees of the garden.
korean_text: 그들이 그 날 바람이 불 때 동산에 거니시는 여호와 하나님의 소리를 듣고 아담과 그의 아내가 여호와 하나님의 낯을 피하여 동산 나무 사이에 숨은지라

sentences.original_text: And they heard the voice of the Lord God
walking in the garden in the cool of the day
and Adam and his wife hid themselves
from the presence of the Lord God
amongst the trees of the garden
